edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course

Class Activity

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.Activity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Conflict
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Course

    public abstract class Activity
extends java.lang.Object
implements Conflict
    Superclass outlines shared state and behavior for Course and Event objects. Methods provide getters/setters for shared Title, MeetingDays, and Time fields for Courses and Events, String output, and shared abstract methods for Course/Event object info output in array form.
    Author:
    Nick Garner

      • Activity

        public Activity(java.lang.String title,
                java.lang.String meetingDays,
                int startTime,
                int endTime)
         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructs an Activity object the given title, meeting days, and start/end times.
        Parameters:
        title - Title of the activity
        meetingDays - Days of the week that the activity meets
        startTime - Start time for the activity
        endTime - End time for the activity
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • setMeetingDays

        public void setMeetingDays(java.lang.String meetingDays)
        Sets the days of the week that the activity meets
        Parameters:
        meetingDays - the days of the week to set for the activity schedule
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If parameter is empty, contains invalid days, or contains a combination of days and Arranged

      • setActivityTime

        public void setActivityTime(int startTime,
                            int endTime)
        Sets start and end times for the activity's scheduled meeting days
        Parameters:
        startTime - The daily start time for the activity
        endTime - The daily end time for the activity
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When either parameter is less than 0 or greater than UPPER_TIME; When endTime is before startTime; When either parameter's minutes are greater than 59; When either parameter is non-zero for an Arranged ("A") class

      • getMeetingString

        public java.lang.String getMeetingString()
        Returns String representation of meeting schedule with time in standard 12h format
        Returns:
        Returns "Arranged" for "A" sections, otherwise returns meeting days and time range for activity.

      • isDuplicate

        public abstract boolean isDuplicate(Activity activity)
        Super method to check if this object is a duplicate of the parameter activity, implemented in Course and Event classes
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity to check for duplicate
        Returns:
        True if activity is a duplicate of existing schedule item

      • checkConflict

        public void checkConflict(Activity possibleConflictingActivity)
                   throws ConflictException
        Compares day and time meeting information for method caller to parameter Activity and throws ConflictException if a conflict is found
        Specified by:
        checkConflict in interface Conflict
        Parameters:

        ConflictException - If a day and time conflict is detected.
